metadata.name: Analyze API Change Impact From Deprecation Spec
metadata.shortDescription: Analyze consumer code impact from changed/evolved/deprecated endpoints and generate a modification + retest tasklist.
metadata.description: From a change/deprecation specification (and optional OpenAPI old/new contracts), identify impacted endpoints, search consumer code for usage, and produce a complete impact map and tasklist for modifications and retesting.
objectives: Read change/deprecation documentation and optionally OpenAPI diffs
Identify impacted endpoints, fields, and behavioral changes
Search consumer code roots for usage (routes, clients, tests)
Produce an impact map and a prioritized tasklist
metadata.author: OLAF Framework
